productDescription: The Goldsmith Earhoops consist of a goldplated 15 mm hoop with a hammered rectangle charm. Wear these earhoops in combination with some other simple earhoops for an edgy look.

optionalInfo.material: Material: Gold plated (14kt) on a silver (925) base
optionalInfo.production: Handmade in our Amsterdam based Atelier of recycled gold.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: We pack your order in plastic-free package material. Free shipping on all NL orders.
